page.title: 05INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: Belper has had its share of famous people in the past.The most obvious is Jedediah Strutt who built the first Spinning mill in Belper.He provided his workers with cottages,shops, churches and farms to provide the food Most of this still remains today. Jedediah Strutt financed Sir Richard Arkwright when he installed his famous invention;the Spinning Jenny,into a few factories at Nottingham and Cromford. George Brown,in more recent years, was the Labour Member of Parliament for Belper.He was the outspoken deputy leader for the Labour Party _ later made Lord George Brown.
